It is highly recommended to visit the castle and the museum of the Battle of Almansa.

Toilets are available but locked, but a very nice family seems to live here and opens them on request. Really one of the cleanest and most beautiful places to rest and take care of. Electricity is hard to come by, but it's free.

title: (02690) Alpera - 44 Calle Templete
description: Very quiet parking space at a natural park of Alpera. Sun in the evening and in the morning.

title: (02660) Caudete - Unnamed Road
description: Secluded area, very quiet and next to a climbing area with very easy access.

name: Camperplaats El Nogal
title: (46620) Camperplaats El Nogal

The camper place is on a kind of lawn, you can also use the swimming pool, toilet, water and shower. The cassette can be emptied (without chemicals). You can drop off your rubbish in our rubbish bin.

title: (02660) Caudete - Avenida de Villena
description: Parking to rest one night in transit. It has shade to get up without stress due to the heat and there is a fountain. It also has a wooded park for children on the other side of the road.

name: Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
title: (46811) Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
description: Naturist campsite Sierra Natura. A truly special place, away from the crowds, imbued with tranquility, freedom and respect. The sites are separated from each other and scattered in nature. The buildings and the pool are very original and beautiful. On the road up the highway, there is a VERY closed and framed curve area in which caution is appropriate and you have to honk to be tracked. Prices are good.

title: (30510) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking near Cantos de Visera. there is a cool cave and hiking trails. no services.

title: (46622) Teresa de Cofrentes - 5 N-330
description: Parking with several spaces next to the road, not many cars pass by and it is quiet

title: (30510) Arabí -
description: Quiet parking lot. Starting point for hikes on Monte Arabí. No cell phone reception.

title: (46623) Jarafuel - Unnamed Road
description: Flat spot in nature next to a gravel road. We slept here 1 night. On main road: when you turn in to this gravel road there is a big bump, so if you have a low van this place is not an option.

title: (46640) - 2E Plaça Poligono 29

Privileged place overlooking the Cañoles river is an important viewpoint of a migratory pass. Fully guarded. No facilities only parking space. No chairs tables or cooking outside the camper.

title: (30510) Arabí -

Barbecue service. Short stays from 3 to 7 days. Optional excursion to Mount El Arabi - World Heritage Site - protected by UNESCO. Only visits booked online. Prohibited entry with children and dogs, pets.

title: (30510) Yecla - 21C Calle de Valencia
description: Water has low pressure but it works, toalet is clean and free. Repsol gas station open 6.00 to 22.00.

title: (30510) Yecla - 51 Calle de la Rambla
description: Laundromat in Yecla plus dryer.

title: (30510) Yecla - 23 Avenida Feria
description: Large street with parking available. In front of the Guardia Civil supermarket and Aldi. Bus stop nearby Outside the trade fair, parking is also available at the trade fair car park. Public toilet in the bus station. Several bars. Park and fantastic children's playground.

title: (30510) Yecla - 31D Avenida Literato Azorín
description: Street behind the hospital, much quieter than the next avenue, on the main avenue and offering the same services on the other side of the park, ideal for children.

title: (03400) Villena - Autovía de Alicante

title: (46640) Mogente - 14 Calle Luis Jorques Gasso

New great and quiet parking space with olive trees on the outskirts of the village on gravel. Nice village with very nice residents, small shops and a good bakery.

Castle tour with private guide also in English.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio
title: (02693) Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio

title: () Jarafuel - Unnamed Road

It has nearby bins but no other service. There is a nearby forest road that surrounds the forest and is very accessible, as well as mtb routes. We have stayed completely alone and without noise by vehicles.

title: (03400) Villena - 1A Partida Emilia P Bazán
description: Flat clearing. habitual parking of the neighbors. widely used to sleep by those who go by van to the concerts that take place in the nearby bullring

description: Good quality drinking water for free.

title: (02695) Villar de Chinchilla -
description: Dirt road that has some places where you can park with a 7.5m AC without problem. In the middle of nowhere, next to a very quiet road that has no traffic at night. We slept very well, sheltered by the oaks.

title: (03409) Villena - Vias Verdes del Xixarra
description: A picnic area with chairs and tables ideal for stretching the legs and for the little ones to run and vent. Wooded with lots of shade. You could still sleep, but we haven't.

title: (46824) Quesa - Avenida Corbera

title: (46870) Ontinyent - Unnamed Road

description:
Closed to Road and near to other parkplace, its above mainroad but hardly noisy waves car.
i think weekends Will be busy With teen drinking but its safer than other and shadowy and tablets to relax.
good place to start different hikes and ferratas among the rock.

title: (03400) Villena - 27 Calle Rosalía Castro
description: A parking lot ideally located for visiting the castle. next to this site is the Granada restaurant bar which offers a delicious menu .

title: (03400) Villena - 18 Calle Rosalía Castro

description: Wastewater drainage at the car wash and fresh water refilling possible by arrangement :) very friendly staff!

title: (46624) Jalance - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and with great views. It is the viewpoint of the Júcar canyons, people don't usually come here and more so now that the Don Juan caves are closed. next to a quiet road. spectacular night. the ground has some inclination

title: (46691) Valencia -
description: Free municipal parking at the tourist office above the village. Gravelled area planted with olive trees for about 10 mobile homes. Toilet disposal facility, but no toilets or fresh water. 10 minutes walk from the village. Nice and quiet place with hiking and climbing possibilities. Point of payment at the entrance of the restaurant "El Romer". Please keep the site clean (there is a dumpster on site) and support Vallada with its restaurants and shops. IMPORTANT: Do not cross the village (road limit of 2m!!!) but via Industrie (outside the village).

title: (46691) Vallada - 119 Polígono Industrial
description: Open field through industrial estate for camping overnight. Parked here and had no problems. No facilities, not very nice, just good for one quick and quiet night.

title: (46691) Vallada -
description: Descampado of the calm and safe earth. Near the city. Access to drinking water. Two restaurants nearby. Saltwater pool from July to September 15th. Climbing area 500 m

title: (46624) -
description: "El Retorno" picnic area just 5 minutes from the town of Jalance. It is located next to an old hydroelectric power plant, now in ruins, through which the river passes to cool off in summer. It has enough picnic tables, and you can spend the night without any problem, there are about 5 places where the terrain is flat, there are some places with shade and the place is surrounded by nature. we accessed without any problem with a 7 m motorhome

title: (46691) Vallada - CV-6492
description: At the top of the mountain, a magnificent sunset and a very nice view of a wind farm in the distance. Very peaceful place not a noise, just a few cyclists. Flat place for one or two motorhomes.

title: (46624) Jalance -
description: Parking at the trailhead to Canyon of Jucar. Two level places and two sloped ones. Road officially only for up to 3t.

name: Campamento Rio Grande
title: (46824) Campamento Rio Grande
description: It really is not a campsite, it is a campground. It is in a very good area, you are walking to the "Charcos de Quesa" along a path. It has bathrooms, showers, hot water, a lot of tranquility, picnic tables scattered throughout the place. It is possible to cook with wood in the paelleros arranged for it. Good site and very pleasant treatment. If you go, contact the owner by WhatsApp, in case he is not there.  The photos are from the Charcos de Quesa. There is a small section of track, but a motorhome enters, if it is very high, enter through the second door, which has no stop.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 10 Plaça Numero 21

title: (46824) - 34 Extrarradio Diseminados

title: (46625) Cofrentes - CV-439

title: (03410) Biar - 3 Calle Josefa Aynat Amorós

My discontent comes when the water does not come out hot and when I have commented on it, they have been indifferent

title: (46625) Cofrentes -

title: (46824) - 6 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Asphalt parking of the city sports center. drinking water, shade and parking. Climbing areas, via ferrata, river with pools for bathing just over 7 km away by paved road Access to the parking lot is a steep ramp but without problems for a motorhome. I travel with a 7.5m and I have not had a problem.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Small parking lot of a bird observatory. Spectacular views, very quiet at night. We spent one night and there was no problem.

title: (46625) Cofrentes -
description: Cofrentes pier parking. Departures fluvial route.

title: (46823) Playamonte - 296 Urbanización Playa Monte 1
description: Spectacular place to spend a fun and refreshing day

title: (03410) Biar - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to spend the night and play sports. Narrow but paved road, with a motorhome you can park at the beginning of the climb if you do not see it clearly.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
description: Perfect esplanade for parking. Very close to the tourist office. There they perfectly explain the points of interest and they even have great guided tours to visit the most interesting parts of the town.

name: Vista Montana
title: (03638) Vista Montana
description: Close by (400 m) a small village with mountains all around, weekly markets on Tuesdays, Fridays and Saturdays. There are also several bars and restaurants, a mini supermarket, butchers and bakers in the village. Dutch owners. Lots of opportunities for walking and cycling. This is a lovely quiet place with beautiful views, yet close to the village. Also plenty of room for large motorhomes ( 12m) Feel free to drop by!

title: (46821) Chella - 9 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Nice place with tables to eat, complicated entrance for a / c nice views of small lake, we have not slept, and I see it very complicated well to spend a few hours and rest

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
description: Recreational area where you can spend the day, have a picnic, there are tables, a river to bathe etc ...

title: (02154) Villavaliente - 25 Calle Joaquín Pardo
description: Area to park and enjoy the pool in the town of Villavaliente. Bar, bakery, small supermarket ... You have a fountain in the park. There are MTB routes in the area. Perfect for visiting Alcalá del Júcar, on the way to Albacete. Be respectful with the people of the town, they are very kind and friendly people.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
description: Moulin de l'Ombria. Camping and picnic area where you can spend the day but night prohibited. In spring and summer it is possible to use barbecues, toilets and other facilities free of charge.

name: Camping Playamonte
title: (46823) Camping Playamonte
description: Camping Playamonte, has plots with electricity, water, drainage, Wi-Fi, cafeteria, playground, rental bikes, laundry, barbecue, sinks

name: B&B Casa Mil Sueños
title: (46870) B&B Casa Mil Sueños
description: Discover the beauty of the Spanish interior with a stay at our atmospheric small-scale camping spot! Enjoy a relaxing getaway in this perfect location and transit route. Due to the limited number of places, calling in advance, whatsapp is recommended. With only a few camper pitches, our camping spot offers a quiet and intimate atmosphere that you won't find on larger campsites. Book now and experience the magic of camping in Spain's Tuscany.

title: (02696) Caserío Alhama - Autovia de Alicante
description: Gas station next to the highway. Suitable for resting or spending the night during the trip

title: (46821) Chella - 4 Calle Rio Sellent
description: Roadside in an undeveloped industrial area. Far enough away from the main road so very quiet. No shade, no service or bins

title: (46820) Anna - 1 Carretera Albufera
description: Parking spaces in a quiet, shaded area, next to the cemetery at the entrance to the town

title: (46820) Anna - 29 Calle de la Sierra
description: Large parking lot directly at the CV580. Right in the middle of Anna village.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 24 Avenida del Catorce
description: Parking area within the town. Just 10 minutes walk to see the Bolbaite River. Although in the same area of the river there is also a place to park, in high season it must be difficult so this is a good alternative

name: Área recreativa El Plano
title: (03639) Área recreativa El Plano
description: Large parking lot next to the grove. There are picnic tables under the trees, restrooms, grills. There is a paved walkway that gives access to some of the tables. There is a large campsite, but vehicles cannot access it. There are also swings and a playground for children. The toilets were closed every time we stopped in the winter.

title: (46821) Chella - 7 Calle Miguel Hernandez
description: Street with the possibility of taking water and a picnic area and right in front of the Consum supermarket

title: (46821) Chella - 8 Bajada Lavadero
description: Car park near the waterfalls of chella! water fountains, children's playground and public bathroom!(no shower)

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 6 Calle las Palmeras
description: Quiet esplanade with a little shade and quite flat where you can rest.

title: (46821) Chella - 178 Avenida Constitución
description: Llanita area, where the information and tourism guy told us to spend the night. Attached to a road with little traffic, near the supermarket at the entrance.

title: (46820) Anna - 76 Diseminado Poligono 11
description: Parking on a one-way street. Street is generally very quiet. On one side of the road is a sports complex and a house for the elderly and on the other side is agriculture and a small park. Trash cans at the end of the street. We slept peacefully for three nights. Nice starting point for walks in the area.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Chirel Castle Route Parking. We entered the forest track and in a siding we stayed to sleep. A lot of tranquility in the middle of nature

title: (46820) Anna - 15A Avenida Diputación
description: This is the parking of the sports center. It is wide enough, has a slight slope that does not prevent sleep and lighting.

title: (46821) Chella - 275 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Only for vans because very complicated for motorhomes. Small car park near Salto de Chella, stuck to the road and next to the river. Two vans can be put there or even three. I stayed there the night of December 23rd. It's next to the river. No toilet, water to 25mts.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 227 Plaça Numero 16
description: Flat grass or small gravel ground near sports facilities

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 9 CV-580
description: Spectacular pine forest around the Santa Bárbara hermitage, surrounded by nature and with little passage of people since it is located at the top of the mountain. Within the area of the hermitage there are a multitude of picnic tables, barbecues, bathrooms, fountains and a restaurant. From there you can see beautiful views of Bolbaite and the castle. There is a first small, more feral parking lot and another one a little higher up with asphalt ground and street lamps (they turn off at 1.30 in the morning, leaving you completely in the dark at night). Perfect place for those looking for absolute tranquility in the middle from the field and let go of children and dogs. Careful! there are wild boars in the area. Trick of the house: in the bathrooms there is a plug, parking in the upper parking lot you can pull an extension cord and connect to the power :-) The same to fill water in the fountain behind the restaurant or in the bathroom sink: with a very long hose you can fill the tank. Garbage and glass containers available. Great as a base camp to visit the river. Another trick of the house: in the recreational area of the river (where you go down some stairs to it, in front of the cooperative) there is another accessible source hidden, with a little nose you can put the van or motorhome next to it.

title: (46822) - 568 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free parking for 3 places, on the outskirts of town. It is on the way to the farms, 3 minutes walk from the town. Tranquility day and night. Ideal for visiting the river bathing area.

title: (46820) Anna - 3 Diseminado Poligono 11
description: Ideal place in flat land to rest and especially to see (you can not miss it) Gorgo de la Escalera. No service, although in the waterfall there is a natural pool.

title: (46820) Anna - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature, very close to Anna, next to a natural pool, very quiet at night, during the day, people bathing, a little difficult to get to.

title: (46870) Onteniente - 21 Polígono Número 16
description: University parking lot, asphalted part and part of land, some tree, quite level and very quiet. To spend a night or just park. Mercadona next door. Well located

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
description: Full land at the back of the sports park. Almost flat along a small path that passes.

title: (46820) Anna - 59 Carrer Violinista Valls
description: Perfect point to park and visit the 3 waterfalls of Anna

name: Aparcamiento Los Chorradores
title: (46823) Aparcamiento Los Chorradores
description: Large dirt parking lot at the start of the hike to the "Los Chorradores" waterfalls. Very calm. Overnight stays are allowed, but not camping.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - CV-81
description: Excellent place to spend the night. very calm.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 7 Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Quiet parking, day and night. A little steep, but fine. We have spent the night and no problem. From here we have gone to see El pou clar. A very beautiful place. 9 minutes by car and 30 minutes on foot.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 20 Calle la Fuente
description: Public parking of the town, paved and with light, in front of the civil guard, we spent a very quiet night, right next to it there are excursions to go to the chorradores de Navarres although there is a day parking later that is the starting point of the excursion.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 57 Plaça Numero 19
description: This is an area we used to park our 6M van to visit the Por Clau waterfall, you just need to walk along the main road for two minutes. We parked here from 11:30-16:15 on a Wednesday.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description:
Beautiful area, very quiet, spent a few nights there, amazing swimming, cliff diving and fishing. Road in is a little rough in spots but well worth it.
CAUTION: Wrong description! It's not a "Place in nature", it's an "4x4 Offroadplace". No way for big Campercars. The stony way goes through a tunnel!

title: (46823) Navarrés - 7 Avenida del Carmen
description: Asphalted parking in front of the Dulmatesa factory, perfect for hiking, seeing the town and making routes.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 50 Carretera la Muela
title_short: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - 50 Carretera la Muela
description: Free parking for motorhomes very close to the town, fenced, with drinking water and litter bins. Beautiful place starting point of hiking and river routes

title: (30520) Jumilla - Unnamed Road
description: After 1 km of track, just after the exit, small horizontal esplanade next to the track, 50 m from the pass on the right. If you see a mini rikiki chapel, it's 100 m before!

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing spot, so quiet and so beautiful. If you park here in the corner the road is still accessible (not that it leads to anywhere). At the end of the road there is an abandoned house. Maximum length is about 6m. Please keep it clean!

title: (46880) Bocairent - 2B Carrer de Joaquim Sorolla
description: Upper part of the city, quiet area with beautiful views. It is very close to the old town, walking around is highly recommended. Fairly well leveled but with much better shims. It is accessed from the back of the city, on the other side there are narrow streets.

title: (46198) Millares -
description: Parking of the Yacimiento de las Icnitas. about 7-10 parking spaces and some benches to eat. The site is very very quiet and allows you to see the site and then rest there. Mountain area, without coverage.

title: (03630) Sax - 17 Camino Cantera
description: Open field daily level overlooking town lots of dog walking but here on a Saturday,fairly peaceful 10 minutes walk up road is picnic area town only down the road for supply,had no disturbances and very clean no water or electric

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: Place between quiet trees with direct views of the reservoir, easy access.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 6 Carretera Subida Calvario
description: Day and night parking is allowed as long as no 'trash' is taken out. Very beautiful views from the Ermita de Navarrés to the town, with some shade, a few picnic tables and next to a park, although it is now sealed off to rehabilitate it. Nearby you have the house of the Little Mouse Pérez and the corridor of pacifiers, very cool for little ones. Los Chorradores, Playamonte nearby and the Escalona dam also with a free bathing area

title: (46817) Estubeny -
description: Take the small road between olive trees and orange trees, turn right onto the dirt road towards the reservoir. Attention, difficult path, have a sufficiently high ground clearance. Small concrete shelter and picnic table. Magnificent view. Just a shame about the noise from the road below. But not disturbing to sleep. Magnificent sunrise and sunset.

title: (02211) Alcalá del Júcar - Carretera de Tolosa
title_short: (02211) Alcalá del Júcar - Carretera de Tolosa
description: Good picnic area without services, but very quiet, with good access and the possibility of parking next to the river.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás -
description: Small recess next to the road, magnificent view of the dam. No car passing at this time

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 18 CV-795
description: Surrounded by nature on the road from Banyeres to Alcoy. information Center. a large natural car park with trees and many spaces, flat area. Without services

title: (02652) Ontur - 297 CM-412
description: Magnificent newly opened motorhome area. Very close to the town. Right next to the pavilion and the municipal swimming pool. Thanks to the Ontur town hall for this great motorhome area.

title: (46199) - 8A Plaça Poligono 17
description: Nice little spot with a reasonable view of the reservoir to camp up. We were actually on the way to another location marked on the app but the road had collapsed just after here and we couldn't get any further. This spot is a levelled gravel pad just off the road. Very quiet and Serene. Access to the water. Lots of stars.

title: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
title_short: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
description: Very good area to spend the night, quiet and bright, and with all the services of the town, bars, bakery, etc etc,

title: (02214) Balsa de Ves - 35 Calle Calvario
description: Pinned to a friend who feet from the municipal water tank. The area is super quiet and has a kind of concrete tables and benches.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 165 Diseminado Diseminados
description: A very very quiet place we stayed one night and very beautiful

title: (03630) Sax - Nº5 Avenida Historia Bernardo Herr
title_short: (03630) Sax - Nº5 Avenida Historia Bernardo Herr
description: Laundry small, medium, large and dry. there is also pet gap

name: LACAVA
title: (03430) LACAVA
description: GAMPING "LA CUESTA" CV 802 km2 -Situated between the Nacional Parks of El Maigmo and La Sierra Mariola known for their natural year round beauty, walking trails, cycle routes, peace and tranquility and multiple fresh water springs. Secure parking, use of barbecue and seasonal use of swimming pool. Relax with open views across the valley to the Castle of Castalla.  Historic Bocairent, Alcoy, Biar and Pou Clar (Ontinyent) nearby.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 165 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very quiet place on the edge of the reservoir. We went to see a place that is right next door, but we preferred to move about 200 meters since in this place we were more sheltered both from the wind and with more privacy.

name: Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title_short: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
description: Association of Campo Alegre Camping Friends. Various accommodations and campsites where our partners, to contribute of the conservation , can stay in our beautiful place with many services and facilities in the countryside just 3 kilometers from the village of Sax. Many hiking and cycling routes available! Call or whatsapp  recommended.

title: (46199) Urbanización las Viñas - Unnamed Road
description: Stunning view of the lake 4x4 needed even in dry weather 4g quiet in nature

title: (46199) Valencia - 8A Plaça Poligono 17
description: Quiet little off road spot, careful as the access is through a windy road. The sign says not prohibited due to a partial road collapse but we entered without any issues. Beautiful spot on the hill with beautiful views. You can eagerly walk down the cliff top and access the lake which is fresh water for swimming/ fishing. Views are a absoloutly stunning. We stayed 1 night with no issue in September 2019. Defiantly worth a visit.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot for hikers, very, very, very quiet road with a wonderful view of the forest and the gorge. The ground is filled with gravel and straight. During the day visitors come and park here. The hiking trails start a few meters along the road. It is about 15 minutes to Pozas del Ral.

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - CV-428
description: Very quiet pine forest area with barbecues. We spent the night without problems 500 meters from the road.

title: (02214) Albacete - 2 Calle Diseminados
description: Quiet place to stop to eat and refill water

title: (46199) Cortes de Pallás - CV-428
description: Spectacular viewpoint.
